description: I really like the idea of this game. Having different sizes of fish with different capabilities move pieces around seems like it has a lot of potential. Unfortunately, the specific rules are a bit confusing and the interface is awful. Having no way (or at least no obvious way, in case I'm just missing it) to change keybindings is a significant factor in this, as is the strange default dialog configuration. I really want to love this game, and I think it has a lot of potential, but it's implementation is currently very lacking.
It just says that it's not responding, it doesn't work at all on Fedora
Des heures de réflexion et un décor très agréable, c'est vraiment un jeu de très bonne qualité.
